wikipedia_page.main: Miles Andrew Richardson (born 26 August 1991) is an English cricketer. He made his first-class debut on 2 April 2017 for Northamptonshire against Loughborough MCCU as part of the Marylebone Cricket Club University fixtures. He made his List A debut for Northamptonshire in the 2017 Royal London One-Day Cup on 30 April 2017.

response: Miles Richardson (born 15 July 1963) is a British actor, born in Battersea, London to parents Ian Richardson (the well-known Shakespearean actor) and Maroussia Frank (daughter of dancer and critic Elizabeth Frank), both founder members of the Royal Shakespeare Company.
